content.text: Good! How are you doing today?
I am doing well. I am an Indian-American wedding photographer. I like to do laundry and spend time with my family. I am allergic to milk. I hate that I got my brain from the dad I never met.

Wow, that sounds interesting! I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day. I also like to learn new things to keep my mind sharp. I like to take a deep breath and remind myself that I'm strong and capable. I also like to listen to old soul music to get my mind off things.
That sounds like a good way to relax. I like to listen to music too. What kind of music do you like?
I have never heard of old soul music. What is it?
Old soul music is a genre of music that was popular in the 1960s and 1970s. It is characterized by its soulful vocals and smooth, jazzy instrumentals.
That sounds interesting. I will have to check it out.
You should! I think you would like it.
